attributes.action: ban alchohol drinking games, shots and happy hours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an ex publican I believe that the way to tackle the current problem with alchohol is to ban shots, happy hours and drinking games such as lighting sambouka so all you ingest is pure alchohol. This just encourages young people to get as drunk as possible as quick as possible.

rejection.details: There is a similar peition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Happy-Hours/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
